items.title: Triage and check for pending tickets and PRs to merge
Start drafting changelog, feature documentation, and marketing materials
Review and update project dependencies as needed
QA prepares release testing assignments
Merge database upgrade
Cut a Release Candidate (RC-1)
QA runs smoke tests on the pre-release build
QA runs automated load tests and upgrade tests on the pre-release build
Triage and merge regression bug fixes
QA final approves the release
Cut the final release build and publish
Deploy changelog, upgrade notes, and feature documentation
Confirm minimum server requirements are updated in documentation
Update release download links in relevant docs and webpages
Publish announcements and marketing
Schedule a release retrospective
Add dates for the next release to the release calendar and communicate to stakeholders
Compose release metrics
Prepare security update communications
Archive the incident channel and create a new one for the next release
